title: Check your tickets! Winning numbers for Oz Lotto's massive $50MILLION jackpot are revealed
text:
Thousands of hopeful Australians are checking their Oz Lotto tickets after the winning numbers were revealed.

The jackpot for Tuesday's night's draw rocketed to $50 million with no division one winners for the last six weeks.

The jackpot has gone off with one lucky division one winner now $50million richer.

The numbers drawn were 5, 32, 22, 13, 20, 25 and 42.

The supplementary numbers were 21 and 23.

The jackpot for draw 1339 was the third biggest division one prize offered so far this year.

Thousands of Australians are checking their tickets after Tuesday night's Oz Lotto draw

One in five Australian adults were expected to have an entry in Tuesday night's draw.

'It's fair to say there's no shortage of people wanting to be crowned Oz Lotto's next division one winner,' The Lott spokesman Matt Hart said.

'With less than three months left in 2019 and in this decade, many players may be dreaming of how their future might look with a truckload of cash in their bank account.'

Nine division one Oz Lotto winners have shared $235 million so far this year.

Three were from Victoria, while Queensland and New South Wales had two each. Tasmania and South Australia have both had one Oz Lotto division one win.

All but two of the Oz Lotto division one winning entries so far this year have been QuickPick entries where the numbers were randomly generated.

The Oz Lotto jackpot was last won in August by an Adelaide man who won $10 million, who said at the time it was 'weird' to learn he had become a millionaire.

It comes after three winners shared the massive $150 million Powerball jackpot which went off last month.

The prize jackpotted from $100million after no winners claimed the first division prize in the previous draw.

Lottery officials said around half of all adult Australians entered the Powerball draw, which eclipses the previous record prize of $107.6 million which went off in January.

The next Oz Lotto draw is next Tuesday night.
description: Thousands of hopeful Australians are checking their Oz Lotto tickets after the winning numbers were revealed. The $50 million jackpot was the third biggest division one prize offered so far this year.
authors: Kylie Stevens For Daily Mail Australia
